title: Omen II: Damien
writer: Harvey Bernhard (story), David Seltzer (based on characters created by), Stanley Mann (screenplay), Mike Hodges (screenplay)
actors: William Holden, Lee Grant, Jonathan Scott-Taylor, Robert Foxworth
plot: Seven years later, 13-year-old Damien is just discovering who he really is, and what he is destined to do. Now living with his Aunt, Uncle, and cousin in a wealthy suburb of Chicago, Damien is anxious to inherit everything. Can Richard Thorn finish the job that Damien's father (Ambassador Thorn) started?
name: Omen II: Damien
